title: An sample old academic transcript, Need to identify the font created by an old printer
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12th%20Board%202_5724.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12th%20Board%201_5110.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12th%20Board%203_6553.png)

Sorry for the poor quality of the image.

I need to identify the font in which the name, the subjects, and the acores etc... have been written(in image 3).

This font has obviously been created by a kind of printer that is not used these days. Therefore am having difficulty finding fonts to compare it with. I tried Identifont and Whatthefont and failed.

I'd appreciate any help with this a lot.
author: ChessWriter

comments.content:
Looks like a dot matrix font that was built into the printer.  
Some of these have been recreated as digital fonts.  
Given the small scale of your image I hesitate to suggest a specific font.  
Take your pick from [http://www.myfonts.com/search/dot+matrix/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/dot+matrix/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/dot+matrix/fonts/")  
or various amateur efforts  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/signus-digital-nbp-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/signus-digital-nbp-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/signus-digital-nbp-font.html")  
 [http://www.dafont.com/dot-matrix.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.dafont.com/dot-matrix.font "http://www.dafont.com/dot-matrix.font")  
 [http://www.dafont.com/5dotmatrix-1979.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.dafont.com/5dotmatrix-1979.font "http://www.dafont.com/5dotmatrix-1979.font")  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/dot-digital-7-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/dot-digital-7-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/dot-digital-7-font.html")  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/enhanced-dot-digital-7-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/enhanced-dot-digital-7-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/enhanced-dot-digital-7-font.html")  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/led-counter-7-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/led-counter-7-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/led-counter-7-font.html")  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/modern-dot-digital-7-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/modern-dot-digital-7-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/modern-dot-digital-7-font.html")  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/serif-dot-digital-7-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/serif-dot-digital-7-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/serif-dot-digital-7-font.html")  
 [http://www.1001fonts.com/square-dot-digital-7-font.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.1001fonts.com/square-dot-digital-7-font.html "http://www.1001fonts.com/square-dot-digital-7-font.html")  
Also  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/fake-receipt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/fake-receipt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/fake-receipt/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/telidon-ink/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/telidon-ink/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/telidon-ink/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/transactive/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/transactive/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/transactive/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-acme/af-cashier/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312143929/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-acme/af-cashier/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-acme/af-cashier/")
